Made changes to ExportProfileViewAction to catch an UnsupportedOperationException thrown by the saveCPs method in ConnectionProfileMgmt until such time as encryption functionality is provided by the framework.

Also made a change to the saveCPs method in ConnectionProfileMgmt to throw the exception BEFORE the file is created if encryption is enabled for the export so we don't create an empty file that then throws the error later.
